TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpecialNameAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that a type or member is treated in a special way by the runtime or tools. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SpecialNameAttribute class is not currently used in the .NET Framework, but is reserved for future use.
